languages.text: "Империум и впрямь... местами закоснел. Звучит здраво".

traits.locale_text: "Империум и впрямь... местами закоснел. Звучит здраво".

languages.text: "Certain aspects of the Imperium have indeed... ossified. His argument sounds reasonable."
languages.original_text: "Империум и впрямь... местами закоснел. Звучит здраво".

traits.locale_text: "Imperium way of thinking can be... rigid indeed. This sounds reasonable."
"Imperium way of thinking can be... rigid indeed. This sounds reasonable."
"Certain aspects of the Imperium have indeed... ossified. His argument sounds reasonable."
"Certain aspects of the Imperium have indeed... ossified. His argument sounds reasonable."
"Certain aspects of the Imperium have indeed... ossified. His argument sounds reasonable."

languages.text: “帝国的某些方面确实……相当僵化，他的论点听起来有理有据。”
languages.original_text: "Certain aspects of the Imperium have indeed... ossified. His argument sounds reasonable."

traits.locale_text: “帝国的某些方面确实……相当僵化，他的论点听起来有理有据。”

languages.text: «Es cierto que algunos aspectos del Imperium se han... anquilosado. Su argumento parece razonable».
languages.original_text: "Certain aspects of the Imperium have indeed... ossified. His argument sounds reasonable."

traits.locale_text: «Es cierto que algunos aspectos del Imperium se han... anquilosado. Su argumento parece razonable».

languages.text: 「帝国の一部の面はたしかに…硬直化している。彼の主張に、一理はあるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Certain aspects of the Imperium have indeed... ossified. His argument sounds reasonable."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の一部の面はたしかに…硬直化している。彼の主張に、一理はあるのだ」

languages.text: "Gewisse Aspekte des Imperiums sind in der Tat ... verknöchert. Sein Argument klingt vernünftig."
languages.original_text: "Certain aspects of the Imperium have indeed... ossified. His argument sounds reasonable."

traits.locale_text: "Gewisse Aspekte des Imperiums sind in der Tat ... verknöchert. Sein Argument klingt vernünftig."

languages.text: « Je dois bien admettre que certains aspects de l'Imperium se sont... pétrifiés. Son argument m'a l'air raisonnable. »
languages.original_text: "Certain aspects of the Imperium have indeed... ossified. His argument sounds reasonable."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois bien admettre que certains aspects de l'Imperium se sont... pétrifiés. Son argument m'a l'air raisonnable. »

languages.text: "İmparatorluk, bazı açılardan gerçekten de fazlasıyla kemikleşmiş vaziyette. Argümanı mantıklı görünüyor."
languages.original_text: "Certain aspects of the Imperium have indeed... ossified. His argument sounds reasonable."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk bazı açılardan gerçekten de fazlasıyla kemikleşmiştir. Argümanı mantıklı görünüyor."
